'''Woco Group''' based in [[Bad Soden]], [[Germany]], is an [[automotive]] [[corporation]] from [[Germany]] which has production and sales locations in 20 different countries including [[USA]], [[Russia]], [[Germany]], [[France]], [[Hungary]], [[India]], [[China]] and [[Romania]].
